    Function reference

    Package Functions and Datasets

    Functions

    Functions for data access.

    get_atmotube_data()
    Retrieve Atmotube Data from the API (Single or Multi-Day)
    get_epa_airdata()
    Download EPA Air Quality Data (EPA AirData Flat Files)
    get_epa_airdata_analyte_codes()
    Retrieve Unique Analyte Codes from EPA AirData
    get_epa_airdata_analyte_label()
    Scrape Table Headers from EPA AirData Webpage
    get_epa_airdata_analyte_tibble()
    Retrieve Unique Analyte Codes from Package Dataset
    get_epa_airdata_zip_links()
    Scrape EPA AirData ZIP File Links and Metadata
    download_stack_epa_airdata()
    Download, Extract, and Optionally Read or Combine CSV Files from EPA AirNow ZIP URLs
    summarise_exposure()
    Compute Air Pollutant Exposure for Given Time Windows

    EPA Datasets

    Built-in EPA datasets for easy usage.

    epa_airdata_links
    EPA AirData ZIP File Links Metadata
    epa_airdata_links_archive
    EPA AirData ZIP File Links Metadata
    epa_airdata_monitoring_sites
    EPA Air Quality Monitoring Sites Metadata
    epa_analyte_codes
    EPA AirData Analyte Codes
    epa_superfund_npl_sites
    EPA Superfund NPL Sites Data

    Metadata Datasets

    Built-in metadata datasets.

    us_states
    US States Data
